kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Initialize Client
kw.doc: Initialize client using host and port of a server which will be used for communication.

kw.name: Start Server
kw.doc: Start HTTP server on specific address and port. Server should be closed when it is not required, for example, when test is over. In case of double call of \`Start Server\`, the previous will be stopped and only then the next one HTTP server will be started.
kw.msg: Prepare HTTP server '127.0.0.1:8000' and thread to serve it.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Send Http Request Async
kw.doc: Send HTTP request with specified parameters asynchronously. Non-blocking function to send request that waits for reply using separate thread. Return connection object that is used as a key to get asynchronous response using function 'Get Async Response'.

kw.name: Wait For Request
kw.doc: Command to server to wait incoming request. This call is blocked until HTTP request arrives. Basically server receives all requests after \`Start Server\` and places them to internal queue. When test call function \`Wait For Request\` it checks the queue and if it is not empty returns the first request in the queue. If the queue is empty then function waits when the server receives request and place it to the queue. There is default time period '5 seconds' to wait request and this waiting time can be changed. If during wait time the request is not received then timeout error occurs.

kw.name: Reply By
kw.doc: Send response using specified HTTP code and body. This function should be called after \`Wait For Request\`.
kw.msg: Push response to the Response Storage: 200

kw.name: Get Request Method
kw.doc: Returns method of received request as a string. This function should be called after \`Wait For Request\`, otherwise None is returned.

kw.name: Get Request Url
kw.doc: Returns URL of received request as a string. This function should be called after \`Wait For Request\`, otherwise None is returned.

kw.name: Get Request Body
kw.doc: Returns body of received request as a string. This function should be called after \`Wait For Request\`, otherwise None is returned.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Stop Server
kw.doc: Stop HTTP server if it has been started. This function should be called if server has been started.
kw.msg: Push response to the Response Storage: <HttpCtrl.internal_messages.TerminationRequest object at 0x7f07ed396990>
